items.title: Deleting Instagram, gaining focus
items.text: After deleting Instagram, I found more time, energy, and attention to read intentionally.

items.title: Curiosity-based reading habit
items.text: I read whatever sparked curiosity and hit a one-hour daily quota, with extras as bonus.

items.title: Two books and a Feynman warning
items.text: I read Deutsch and Holiday, and both echoed Feynman: don’t fool yourself first.

items.title: How high ego blocks learning
items.text: High ego made me fear sounding bad on guitar and resist learning from a kid.

items.title: Purpose fantasies vs doing what’s needed
items.text: I chased world-changing purpose while neglecting basics, until I focused on what needed doing.

items.title: Rejection, growth, and good explanations
items.text: After hackathon rejection, I learned no-code, improved, and kept seeking better explanations with humility.
